title: Bad Boys Wanted
description: Bad Boys WantedAn Erotic Romance AnthologyWhen they're bad, they're oh so good. This collection of six steamy erotic tales featuring the best of the bad boys is sure to leave you wanting more.Included Stories:Unrepentant – Lila ShawOver the Edge – Stella BerkleyDeath’s Angel – Kastil EavenshadeFinding Forever – Lynn BurkeTemptations of the Cage – R. BrennanWithout Words – Lolly Tova
author: Lynn Burke
